website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and with a simple design.
pros: This 12-month desk pad calendar is cheaper than the competition
Each page includes a notes section and mini calendar at the bottom
cons: Paper is thin and easy to wrinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great for 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for the wife and I. Helps keep track of the schedules, bills pay days etc... flipped through it and realized it skips from April to June. Ummm... kind of a busy month for us. Maybe they'll send me complete one? Other than that, it's a big calendar. Pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Antalek

customer_reviews.title: Forget the electronic calendars, the family can reference this one easier.
customer_reviews.text: The format may be plain, but it is practical because you get more space to write on for each day. Our family uses it as a wall calendar by the phone. Two holes on the top make for easy mounting with two big nails. This calendar and the generic office supply ones have the same hole spacing so next years calendar can be mounted on the same holes. Near the current year's end (like October), the next year's calendar can be mounted behind the current helping you schedule those events as well. I prefer this to my electronic calendars because the kids and hubby can reference it too, and information can be easily added while you are on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: P. Groom

customer_reviews.title: Good Calendar
customer_reviews.text: OK it's only a calendar, but I still wanted to like it as I'm going to be looking at it all year. The size is perfect for my desk. I put my keyboard right on top of it and it keeps my desk surface protected. I like the fact that I always have something handy to write on if I need to take notes while on a phone conversation. I can not who and when a spoke with someone and I'll have a record of the for the entire year as I save the pages as I rip them off. The quality is about that of any such calendar I've had. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara270

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early but creased and ripped...
customer_reviews.text: We are a very busy family and I take my calendars very seriously. I fill them out and color code everybody and mount it on the fridge so we can all stay on track. I always buy the Staples brand of these in-store, but decided to try Amazon this time since I have a house full of sick people. It came a day earlier than it said it would, so that was nice. But there was a crease on the bottom and the top black part was ripped. Neither are huge issues but it was worth noting. I'll just stick to Staples next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loo

customer_reviews.title: Chaos Coordinator
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to keep track of 4 kids, 6 pets, and a husband. Digital calendars are nice but it’s better to see everything on a giant paper right in front of me. I get one of these every year to hang in our laundry hallway to keep track of all our family appointments, kids sports, husbands travel, etc. Its big and allows plenty of room for multiple entries per day. The giant box it came in was a little excessive though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year to keep track of my family of five's different schedules. Each day is lined so it's easy to write multiple things on each day. There are also places for notes on each month. Yes I have a phone that I also use for a calendar but there's something about it being written out for the whole month that seems much more functional for me. I've turned several friends onto this calendar they all love it too.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: Bad defaulted choice.  Make sure to check the defaulted year
customer_reviews.text: This is partially my fault, that is why I gave it 2 stars because I do like the calendar, but when searching for a calendar for 2018, I don't think that a 2017 calendar should come up as an option let alone defaulting to 2017 and 2018 as an option. Now again I am taking blame for making the assumption that 2017 calendar would not be an option when searching for a 2018 calendar but I think that in 2018 or any time after say September or October and later the previous year the default should be the next year. This post is make sure the user checks the calendar year.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Don't change a thing except the year!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding, my life without the written word! i can't live without this on my desk! i put everything one it and save it, it has all my notes, thoughts, appointments, reminders...etc. And I never have to hunt for a note, I just know I will have this large "note pad" for a full year and it stays on my desk. I reference months back because when I take off the previous month's scribbling for the new month, I tuck the page under it. At the end of the year I save it and have referenced it many times....I guess I am hard wired but I need things visible and written, not electronic, i need the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Buy it every 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone buy a 12-month calendar every 6 months? Because it makes perfect sense, and At-a-Glance makes them for this reason. Every December, buy the calendar starting in January and you can schedule out through December. Every June, but the calendar that starts in July, transfer your notes, and you can schedule through the following June. For those who must keep double calendars (paper and electronic) like lawyers, it is a near perfect arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Great desk pad calendar for productive professionals!
customer_reviews.text: THE standard for desk pad calendars. I enjoy the simple design and clean cut style which allows for lots of activities/appointments to be recorded each day. I wish that the paper was a bit thicker, however it is fine for what I use it for everyday. Occasionally I have coffee/tea rings from my mug on it which is a measure of a productive month. I highly recommend this so you can keep track of your daily activities at a glance right there in front of you. I tend to memorize the entire month to know what days are when, which is important in my busy life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Adam

customer_reviews.title: 11 out of 12 isn't...all that bad
customer_reviews.text: One of the months was printed upside down. ONE OF THE MONTHS WAS PRINTED UPSIDE DOWN. How does that slip past quality control? I mean, that's a 9% error rate. The other months are okay, but you're going to have to tear that one month out and re-insert it and tape it in place. I'm assuming it isn't just MY copy that's misprinted. Maybe other copies have MORE months printed upside down, sideways, or using Roman numerals. Better luck next year, ACCO.
customer_reviews.author: Redpenned

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar, excellent price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase my calendars from Amazon because it's less expensive for the same item. It always arrives as promised being an Amazon Prime member. I can keep up with everything with the date lines which makes it easy to write several items for the dates. I hang it on the wall and the holes are consistent. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: DaWizSista

customer_reviews.title: Service is impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I want to say the return policy is magnificent! I hit the wrong button and got the larger size, not what I wanted. I was going to send it back, but it would of cost me almost as much as the calendar. At-A-Glance refunded without me having to send it back. I AM IMPRESSED! Thank you, I did order the smaller size, which I've used for years.
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: 2018 calendar when going into 2019 SERIOUSLY??
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a calendar in December 2018 thinking that the calendar that I would have received would be for 2019. Why would I want a 2018 calendar in December 2018 Not happy!!! Not going to the trouble of returning
customer_reviews.author: Carman

customer_reviews.title: Very useful if you take a lot of weekly daily notes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd year buying this calendar. In fact I just bought a 2nd 2017 calendar because they are so handy for my small landscape company. I make notes on it for site visits, important dates, upcoming projects, employee schedule or daily details, upcoming meetings etc, etc. So the large writing area is perfect for me. Right now I have one calendar in my small office area for my own use and I have another on the way which I will hang out in the shop for employee use. I will probably continue buying them annually.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bertucci

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is nice and big with ample room for writing in each box. I took off one star because the paper seems very thin and the cardboard backing pretty measly. It probably won't be a problem since it will be against either a wall or a desk. All-in-all $10 for a large yearlong calendar is a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Put mine on the wall next to my desk. Can see the whole month and all the stuff I need to remember to do. I will also write in next month's dates in the empty boxes on bottom row. I have used this type of calendar for years. Use to shop in local stores, but I am 90% home-bound now, so switched almost all my shopping to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: non-expert

customer_reviews.title: Permanent Records of My Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Damn, what a calendar! You just get a pen or pencil or crayon or spray paint and then you scribble some junk in one of the boxes - then, BAM!!! everybody can walk by and say, "Holy @#$%! Emily has soccer practice on Wednesday at 6PM?!" or "Dude making every Sunday purple is, like, a stroke of freaking genius!" Can other dork calendars pull that off? No. No they can't.
customer_reviews.author: Francis H. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend a calendar like this for a family on the go
customer_reviews.text: These calendars are a god send. This is supposed to be used on your desk but I use this to keep track of our busy family's schedules. I have 2 very active teens and a husband. This hangs on the wall in our dining room so we know who needs to be where when. The lined is the best so it looks neatly written. I highly recommend a calendar like this for a family on the go!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Stingley

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendar
customer_reviews.text: Every year I buy a table calendar who I occasionally hang on my wall. It is nice and sturdy, the paper is not too thin that it would bleed through. It has enough space to write everything and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa F

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Favorite calendar! Holidays plainly marked, useful year-long calendar strip at the bottom for advance planning, chronologic day of the year with days left notated each day, plenty of space in the date boxes for notes and a separate box for miscellaneous notes. And the pages are denser/thicker than the store-brand ones that your hi-lighters and Flair pens bleed-through onto the following month's calendar, so there's no problem there either. It's the perfect size for an office desk or a home desk and provides a nice surface to write upon.
customer_reviews.author: Cuffy

customer_reviews.title: Family activities much easier to track
customer_reviews.text: I'm busy with volunteering and teaching and so have hung this type calendar in my kitchen for four years now. My family can see where I am at a glance and I'm no longer having scheduling problems. My husband writes his commitments on it as well. We are able to write in reminders of expiring warranties, doctor appointments months ahead, birthdays & anniversaries. All the stuff our family needs or wants to know.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Yarn Addict

customer_reviews.title: Using push-pins Isn't most ideal for me because I added velcro to the top of the black portion of the calendar so I am able to s
customer_reviews.text: It is large enough that I Velco-ed it to my wall and write in events/appointments. Using push-pins Isn't most ideal for me because I added velcro to the top of the black portion of the calendar so I am able to stick my Sharpie/marker onto it for easy use, and I found that my calendar easily disconnects from the wall this way when I pull the marker way from the calendar while using push-pins to hold it to the wall. after using velcro it sticks on to the wall with great confidence. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penney!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 80 year old mother to keep her a little more organized and it's working! She keeps track of everything on this. She mentioned to me that she had used one in her office job years ago and would like another because she forgets things these days. Such a difference and it gives her something to keep up with. She feels better about things because she doesn't forget as much. WORTH THE MONEY!!! ::-)
customer_reviews.author: Waitingformyshepherd

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendar that I review daily
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every December for the following year. I hang it on the wall behind my office desk. I use a Sharpie to mark important days of the month, as well as anything I need to focus on for the month. The paper is thick enough that the Sharpie ink doesn't bleed through to the next page. It's a good size. It's something I look at every day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L.

customer_reviews.title: Definite would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Superior calendar. Very pleased with the price, shipping and size. I put this on the back of my office door with two 3M hooks. Awesome and a definite yes. Only caveat....don't use a Sharpie....that's gonna bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 9

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description regarding mini at-a-glance calendars (if that is an important factor in your purchase as it was for me)..
customer_reviews.text: The desk calendar I needed and though I bought based upon pictures and description was to have the mini at-a-glance calendars at the bottom. Instead, I received a desk calendar with the mini at-a-glance calendars at the top. This configuration does not work for me. This was a poor experience and I will be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH M KRAUS

customer_reviews.title: This desk calendar works well with easy to tear off pages
customer_reviews.text: This desk calendar works well with easy to tear off pages, big dated squares with plenty of room to write and add notes. I like how there is a full calendar across the bottom of every page so that when you need to look at a previous or later month, the dates are there for you. The dates are also numbered, telling you how many days are left in the year and how many days have passed, in addition to holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: STINKS - Smelly ink
customer_reviews.text: This year this company used a strong smelling ink. I can't use it because of chemical allergies. I tried to hang it but felt gradually ill by the day. Since the return window is closing, I guess I'll try to give it away, or toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adsit

customer_reviews.title: Big desk calendar, great for people who love writing memos
customer_reviews.text: These calendars are perfect for me. Enough space to write 3-5 notes per day. Paper quality is roughly that of printer paper, would be nice if it was a bit thicker so I could use highlighters or markers without it bleeding through. It's a giant calendar perfect for writing on (with pen/pencil), not much more to say. Don't buy this if you have limited space or prefer carrying your calendar around with you.
customer_reviews.author: NintendoFanGirl

customer_reviews.title: Defective-Month of May page is missing!
customer_reviews.text: While flipping through to month of May to jot down a May event, I discover there is NO May page! Completely missing. DEFECTIVE calendar and too late to get this resolved and get new calendar for free, as I purchased back in late November/early December. Although I'm hoping they make this right. If they do, I'll update my review to 5 stars, as it is good desk pad calendar.
customer_reviews.author: janet waugh

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar for home (or office)
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is just what I wanted. I've been suffering with a "decorator" calendar I received as a gift. It is useless as there day squares at just too, too little to write a note! I'm going to by a At-A-Glance Desk Pad Calendars as a annual gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Danniedee

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I needed it to do.......sit there and show me what day it is. The square for each day is big enough to write down notes or reminders for the day and there is a hole on either side of the top black area to run a cord through if you want to hang it. Perfect desk top size.
customer_reviews.author: Cable

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to see at a glance.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these calendars for years. They're the perfect size for a large desk and there's plenty of room to write all my pertinent information. I can easily see what needs to be done over the entire month, and I use a highlighter for important events.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Merc

customer_reviews.title: Old-fashioned family calendar is way better than a smart phone calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these every year and hang it up so the family always knows what is going on. Smart phones calendars are useless when your phone is lost or breaks and no one else can access them to know what is going on, so there is nothing like the family calendar on the wall for everyone to use.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great for Getting Your Life Together
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a calendar to get on top of my assignments and life in general. I was using a daily and weekly planner, but was losing sight of the greater picture. Large enough to add all my assignments and then some last minute plans! I hung it up next to my desk and it looks clean and hangs well. Compared to the stores around here, this is a great deal and I'd recommend it for any student that needs help remembering when assignments are due!
customer_reviews.author: Suelin Kwon

customer_reviews.title: great for busy families
customer_reviews.text: My family can not work without this calendar. We buy it year after year and keep track of everything going on in our family with it. We have it up on the wall in the kitchen using command hooks. It has enough room to write several things for each day. I like the whole calendar at the bottom but do miss the memo area they used to have for phone numbers and things.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: This is a real good time management learning tool
customer_reviews.text: How ya gonna be confused about what day it is with this MONSTER? I put one up in each of my kids rooms and in the kitchen. Their assignments, chores, (my bday) go right on their calendars - in ink. No more excuses! This is a real good time management learning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Justfornow

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Family Command Center wall
customer_reviews.text: We have this mounted on the wall for our family command center. I tried regular wall calendars but they never gave me enough room to write everything. This is perfect - large grids to write on and I love the months running along the bottom of each month page.
customer_reviews.author: Busyworkingmom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I buy this calendar every year for my office. Large boxes to write in and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne scavuzzo

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC- - - - A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY DESK
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for the first time last year, & I was much more organized last year. It is now imperative for me to own one of these every year for the rest of my life. I now know, as my memory fades, that @ least my bills will all be paid on time & I will never miss an appointment. Like I said, a MUST have. You will be glad you did by May or June.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Roesler

customer_reviews.title: It's a large calendar.
customer_reviews.text: Ummm, it's a large paper calendar. Desktop or wall mount. Plenty of room to write notes/appointments etc. Seems pretty accurate, all the days of the week are there...in order, all twelve months, and all the months even have the correct number of days (again, in order!) I hold my calendars to high standards, and this one meets or exceeds them :)
customer_reviews.author: Glenzoni

customer_reviews.title: Very handy Organizer and appointment keeper
customer_reviews.text: Standard desk calendar at a good price. The dates are big enough to write down appointments. The 12 month band at the bottom is handy for looking ahead and behind. This is a great place to see your appointments etc for a month and even beyond. Doctors appointments etc can be written in way in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kant

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight for hanging.  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My college kids live on these. This is a 4th year reorder. :) This particular brand is nice and lightweight. The pages flip easily. It's lightweight enough that it truly hangs on the wall without use of nails, just a bit of college-approved wall adhesive tape. Squares are big enough for writing, and the lines through the squares is super light, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to calendar every year! We hang it on our wall in the pantry so it's easy to use. There is a lot of space for writing all of our family activities. I love that it is lined so everything is neat and easily readable.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: You get what u paid for
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard desk calendar. Standard desk calendar size. No real bells or whistles, just your average desk calendar. Paper is thick enough. Plenty of space to write. My husband keeps one of these in he garage at his desk, and he loves it. I will probably order again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Cat 333

customer_reviews.title: Good calendar to buy
customer_reviews.text: Really like that the boxes are BIGGER so I can write all kinds of appointments and that the months are listed below for quick reference. I am crazy about keeping track of appointments and don't like to miss credit card payments or rents due. I hang this calendar on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: George Pill

customer_reviews.title: Great spaces for writing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk calendar. Plenty of room to write in appointments, events, etc. A little oversized for my desk, so I will look for a smaller one for next year. dimensions: 22" x 17" (17" included width of binder). Nice corner pockets to hold unused pages.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Boxes big enough to write stuff in
customer_reviews.text: We get one of these every year in the fall & hang it on the wall in the kitchen. It's a great functional calendar. Taking away one star for this reason only: AT-A-GLANCE, why can't I buy more than one year ahead at a time? Don't love that but everything else is A-OK.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Love these large desk calendars!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these large desk calendars. I can easily reference any appointment, even though I also have them all in my iPhone calendar, as well. But, its nice to be able to quickly jot down notes when on the phone, etc. or about any appointment that is scheduled. Thanks. I prefer AT-A-GLANCE products.
customer_reviews.author: lyrical lass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my mother with Alzheimer's - room for large ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mother with Alzheimer's - room for large writing for appointments or shower dates, etc. We cross out with a big X when the day is done so she knows what day it is when she wakes up. Quality product too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessary item for me
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep up with appointments? Me either. That is until I received this calendar . It sits on my desk in front of my computer monitor with all appointments and expected dates of orders from Amazon written on the calendar. No forgotten appointments. And I know when to expect my packages from Amazon. Works great for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: GWD

customer_reviews.title: Our family calendar for the past 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year and always great quality! I hang it on the door to the garage with small 3M hooks. It's perfect for our family calendar and easy for everyone to read as they walk out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Desktop calendar  pad
customer_reviews.text: Dependable as always. Large spaces for me to ride in for events that may occur each day. Or use colored markers to help differentiate the events. I love this calendar guest bed and buy it every year. Very inexpensive it is a wonderful help to me throughout the year. It always arrives in perfect shape
customer_reviews.author: daddeedogdavid

customer_reviews.title: DUH. It does what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I MEAN, IT IS WHAT IT IS! WOULD I RECOMMEND THIS: YES, love it. It's the perfect size. Arrived as expected and on time: YES Meet Expectations: YEP Description Accurate: YEP My favorite part about this item: The lines, for this perfectionist! Would I buy it again: YES NEXT YEAR
customer_reviews.author: dangteena

customer_reviews.title: We have been using these for over a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for over a year and it has been a big help. We have ours hanging in the kitchen and anyone can write their events onto it. It's so much easier to keep our schedule lined up now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice look
customer_reviews.text: It was as I expected it to be. Lined boxes make it a little more organized and clean looking. I really like the vinyl corner protectors. They help keep the pages contained and they look nice. Everyone in our office has one.
customer_reviews.author: Diannah S.

customer_reviews.title: Love large calanders
customer_reviews.text: Love the large area to write in. If I dont write it down I'll forget, great for busy people/families. Quick shipping. I used mine as a wall hanging.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moody

customer_reviews.title: I like the yearly calendar on the bottom so you can ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used these calendars for a long time. I like the yearly calendar on the bottom so you can look up dates in the future and past without taking your material off the desk. I used to pay $3.99 for these calendars. With shipping you charge around $10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. It's prefect for keeping appointments, meetings, birthdays, and other scheduled events. Each month's sheet also shows the months surrounding it so you can easily count forward or backward from a specific date. Each sheet also has a notes section in the margin.
customer_reviews.author: Lit RoxTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great price! This works great for my wife and ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking. Great price! This works great for my wife and I planning things out for the month since she works as a nurse and has an ever changing schedule. Plenty of space to write, and I got the lined one. It makes it very easy to organize. Great for a kitchen wall.
customer_reviews.author: steveronibamboni

customer_reviews.title: Can't be without!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot sit at my desk - work or home ever without something to write on. I have note pads everywhere but need to grab a pen and write. Even told myself I didn't need it - won't order one this year. 2018 just came this week.
customer_reviews.author: Nisaa Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't withstand minor wear and tear of being on a desk.. Not sure if it was just a bad item, or if all of the newer ones are like this. I have historically purchased At-A-Glance calendars with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: StreetsBeatsEats

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one smaller but couldn’t find one in the size that I wanted. So while this does the job it’s way too big for my needs. I don’t have it in my desk but in a wall so I guess that works ok
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn

customer_reviews.title: The best calendar there is for keeping track of your daily tasks.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calendar for scheduling your lifes events possible. My wife uses this in her "command center", and she would not be without it. She is extremely busy and this keeps her on track. She has it hung on a wall and she refers to it daily. This is a fantastic calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Baconbandit1973

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Order!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect sized desk calendar to keep on top of my medium sized desk. I needed to be able to track books and reviews and this will do nicely. The paper is not thin and it’s just a very usable block spaced calendar.
customer_reviews.author: That’s my Patty!

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL, SIMPLE, RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.text: Second time we've ordered these. My wife used these when she managed a big Dialysis Clinic. Now that we're retired she uses it on her desk to keep track of all the other things now. Useful, simple.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schatan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Just what I was looking for. I have so many appointments and its hard to keep track with a pocket calendar. This did the trick. On my desk where I can check everyday. I really like the lined boxes to separate and see it better. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This actually came a day earlier than estimated so I can get busy with my calendar notes. This is the same make and model as my existing calendar with the year being the only difference. Perfect for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Only one ill buy.
customer_reviews.text: For 3 years now this is what I use. I love how large it is. I hang it on the wall for my whole family to see. Don't need to remind my husband what's I'm doing on days because he can just look. The kids love counting down days until birthdays or holidays once we get to a new month.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolingmamaof4

customer_reviews.title: Big Boxes, hangs easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wall calendar. Each date has 6 lines of blank space to write events in, and the calendar is not heavy. I use two pins to just stick it directly into the wall. Stayed up all year. I'll be buying these every year from now on.

customer_reviews.title: These are truly the best calendars and I WILL order them again
customer_reviews.text: As always, these AT-A-GLANCE calendars are first class all the way. They are perfect for our office needs, which makes me happy. Happy employees make me happy because I'm the office supply order gal. They were shipped quickly and arrived undamaged, which was awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this calendar for many years now and it's just perfect for my use. Fits nicely on my desk, plenty of space to write appointments, and it's the best bargain out there.

customer_reviews.title: We love this calendar
customer_reviews.text: We love this calendar! The spaces for each day are big so I can write a lot if I need and the price is great! A little hard sometimes to rip the months off, but for the price it has been totally worth it for us!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY calendar desk pad - Excellent

customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: The best

customer_reviews.title: Best desk calendar
customer_reviews.text: This calendar saves my life! My kids sports activities and doctors appointments are insane! This calendar stays on my long coffee table year after year to keep me in track! Thick paper that is sturdy and easy to fill in slots.

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I get one every year, hot glue magnets on the back, and hang it on my refrigerator. Each say is a good size for making notes of b'days, appts, special occasions. Very handy for the whole family to keep current on what's going on with the family.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wall too

customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good size and enough room to write in info for each day in the calendar
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my desk. Large enough so that I can put documents on top of it (ie, to do my normal work), and each day's slot is big enough for me to write in shorthand notes about activities. Perfect size for my needs...I get this item each year.

product_meta.title: AT-A-GLANCE Monthly Desk Pad Calendar, Ruled Blocks, January 2018 - December 2018, 22" x 17" (SK2400)
product_meta.description: Monthly desk pad calendar helps protect your desktop and serves as a perfect resource for all your planning and scheduling needs. The 12 month calendar covers January to December with one month per page for easy referencing of dates. The large, ruled blocks allow you to take notes and track appointments and monthly goals on this professional desk pad. Block size: 2 7/8" x 3 3/8". extra lined notes space is also included. A full calendar year is printed at the bottom of each page for future planning and fast date reference. Monthly calendar pages are perforated for a clean and easy tear off at the end of each month. This desk pad is printed in black on white paper with a wide black top binding. The binding is punched with eyelets so that the desk pad can also serve as a wall calendar. Two black Poly corners keep pages flat for hanging or desktop use. Printed on quality paper containing 30% post-consumer recycled material. Page size: 22" x 17".
feature_bullets: Desk pad with classic styling and ruled blocks helps protect your desktop. 12 month desk pad covers January - December for a full Year of planning power. Julian dates. One month per page layout
Large, ruled daily blocks. Each block is 2-7/8" x 3-3/8". full Year, 12 month calendar reference included. Desk pad is printed in black ink on white paper. Pages are perforated.
Wide black headband with eyelets. Durable backboard provides sturdy writing surface. Printed on quality paper containing 30% post-consumer recycled material. 22" x 17" page size.
